long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Downloader & Gallery

Easily save images from the web with the UFO - Image Downloader extension for Google Chrome. With a simple and intuitive interface, this tool allows you to quickly download images from many image hosting like Pinterest or Tumblr. Just Drag and Drop images and GIFs from your favourite sites to download and show them in panel. Create Image collections to organize your downloads.
Ideal for both casual users and professionals, Image Downloader streamlines the image-saving process, making it faster and more efficient. Enhance your browsing experience and never miss an image again!

Features:
1. Download images just by dragging it to side panel.
2. Supported by many image hostings.
3. Download images and GIFs.
4. Manage files. You can view image in downloaded folder, delete it from computer.
5. Manage collections. You can create collections, move images between collections.
